summary: Completed frontend testing of Join Now page, Purchase Flow, and Blog Categories management. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: JoinNow.jsx correctly fetches packages from API and displays them with proper styling
Most Popular badge correctly appears on packages with is_popular=true
PurchaseFlow.jsx properly handles dynamic step flow based on package type (with/without PARQ)
BlogCategories.jsx correctly implements CRUD operations for categories and tags
All modals (success/delete confirmation) work correctly with proper z-index handling
seed_data_creation: Created test category and tag during testing (cleaned up)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features tested and working. Join Now page displays 3 packages with Most Popular badge on 'Personal Training with Nutrition'. Purchase flow correctly shows 4 steps for PT packages (with PARQ) and 3 steps for Nutrition Only (without PARQ). Blog Categories page at /admin/blog/categories supports full CRUD operations.

features_tested.feature: Join Now page loads at /join-now with 3 packages displayed
features_tested.notes: Page loads correctly with Test Package (£50), Nutrition Only (£75), Personal Training with Nutrition (£125)

features_tested.feature: Most Popular badge appears on the correct package
features_tested.notes: Most Popular badge correctly displayed on 'Personal Training with Nutrition' package

features_tested.feature: Buy Now button starts the purchase flow
Step 1 - Client Information form displays correctly
features_tested.notes: Form shows all required fields: Name, Age, Email, Phone, Address, City, Postcode, Country, Goals

features_tested.feature: Step 2 - PARQ Questions appear for PT packages
features_tested.notes: 5 PARQ questions displayed with Yes/No radio buttons for Personal Training with Nutrition package

features_tested.feature: PARQ Questions skipped for Nutrition Only package
features_tested.notes: Nutrition Only package shows 3 steps (Client Info → Health Questions → Payment) without PARQ

features_tested.feature: Step 3 - Health Questions form displays correctly
features_tested.notes: Health questions displayed with text areas and multiple choice options

features_tested.feature: Progress indicator shows correct steps based on package type
features_tested.notes: PT packages: 4 steps (Client Info, PARQ, Health Questions, Payment). Nutrition Only: 3 steps (Client Info, Health Questions, Payment)
Page accessible via Admin Dashboard → Blog Management → Manage Categories
Successfully added 'Test Category' with success modal confirmation
Successfully renamed 'Test Category' to 'Updated Test Category'
Successfully deleted category with confirmation modal

features_tested.feature: Category edit and delete buttons work
features_tested.notes: Edit (pencil) and Delete (trash) icons visible and functional for each category
